p: Especially because this type work is not yet fully commodified, I am indebted to the reviewers, no matter how kind or critical they have been. And each of the reviews do contain praise, but they also contain either explicit or implicit criticisms. In the spirit of Hegelian dialectics, I will try, in this response, to deepen and, at times, exaggerate those critical points in order to emphasize the weaknesses and gaps in the book and to try to move the arguments and ideas forward.
